Uses of Class
com.github.ngeor.yak4j.RequestEntityAssert

    • Uses of RequestEntityAssert in com.github.ngeor.yak4j

      Methods in com.github.ngeor.yak4j that return RequestEntityAssert 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <T> RequestEntityAssert<T> Assertions.assertThat​(RequestEntity<T> requestEntity)
      Starts building assertions for the given request entity.
      RequestEntityAssert<T> RequestEntityAssert.hasAcceptHeader​(MediaType mediaType)
      Verifies that the request entity's actual Accept header is equal to the given one.
      RequestEntityAssert<T> RequestEntityAssert.hasAuthorizationHeader​(String value)
      Verifies that the request entity's Authorization header is equal to the given one.
      RequestEntityAssert<T> RequestEntityAssert.hasBody​(T body)
      Verifies that the request entity's actual body is equal to the given one.
      RequestEntityAssert<T> RequestEntityAssert.hasContentTypeHeader​(MediaType mediaType)
      Verifies that the request entity's Content-Type header is equal to the given one.
      RequestEntityAssert<T> RequestEntityAssert.hasJsonAcceptAndContentTypeHeaders()
      Verifies that the request entity's Accept and and Content-Type headers are both equal to application/json.
      RequestEntityAssert<T> RequestEntityAssert.hasJsonAcceptHeader()
      Verifies that the request entity's Accept header is equal to application/json.
      RequestEntityAssert<T> RequestEntityAssert.hasJsonContentTypeHeader()
      Verifies that the request entity's Content-Type header is equal to application/json.
      RequestEntityAssert<T> RequestEntityAssert.hasMethod​(HttpMethod httpMethod)
      Verifies that the request entity's actual HTTP method is equal to the given one.
      RequestEntityAssert<T> RequestEntityAssert.hasUrl​(String url)
      Verifies that the request entity's actual url is equal to the given one.
      RequestEntityAssert<T> RequestEntityAssert.hasUrl​(URI url)
      Verifies that the request entity's actual url is equal to the given one.
